name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Product Manager with 8+ years of experience, I excel in **Product Strategy**, **Agile**, **Scrum**, and **User-Centered Design**. Leveraging my B2B knowledge and experience with **SAP**, I drive the development of **AI-driven Applications** through **Cross-Functional Collaboration**. I am adept at enhancing organizational efficiency and customer focus by fostering open communication channels and implementing strategies that prioritize user needs. Additionally, I bring a strong technical background as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer, proficient in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), with expertise in frontend frameworks such as **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. My experience with cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**, and database optimization using **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, enables me to deliver high-performance solutions tailored to business objectives. I am committed to adhering to industry best practices while focusing on delivering impactful results.
